channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Role-based Authorization Strategy Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Role-based Authorization Strategy Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2286|2024-08-04T07:01:41.187Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20role-based%20authorization%20strategy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Role-based Authorization Strategy Plugin 3.0 and earlier does not properly invalidate a permission cache when the configuration is changed, resulting in permissions being granted based on an outdated configuration.
